price: Yewe Muhanuzi (Muhamadi)! Mu by’ukuri twakohereje kugira ngo ube umuhamya, utanga inkuru nziza, ndetse ukaba n’umuburizi,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu innā arsalnāka shāhidan wamubashiran wanadhīran
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
